overview:
Overview

Keon Solutions is an ERP Consultancy company specializing in providing End-to-End solutions, qualified personnel and onsite/offshore services at cost-effective rates and on time. ï‚¤ Keon Solutions was started in 2009 by a team of 2 entrepreneurs who had already scripted successful careers in MNCs and Organizations like Cognizant, T-Systems, Satyam, Tata Group, Finolex Cables and many more. The promoters have extensive experience of multi-diversified SAP implementations and extensive hands-on experience in managing turnkey projects with teams of more than 200 members. ï‚¤ Our strength lies in SAP , SAP Integration, Business Process Integration and mobility solutions. ï‚¤ Our mission is; Customer Delight, Healthy Working Environment and build innovative solutions ï‚¤ We are among the growing IT Services company. Our growth has been powered by our consultative approach, our deep understanding of business and technology, our passion for innovation - and above all, our integrity. ï‚¤ Industry expertise spans across Automobile, Manufacturing & Telecom & Utilities

Our Strengths

One-stop-shop for all your SAP, Process Integration and Mobility solution requirements. ï‚¤ Visit us at www.keonsolutions.com to get a better understanding of us ï‚¤ Experience of 12 E2E Implementations, 8 ALM Projects & 4 Migration/Upgrade delivering some of the major IT Projects/Programs in Automotive, Telecom & Semiconductor industry ï‚¤ Expertise in the CORE SAP modules and the most niche areas of SAP viz. SRM, HCM, SCM, Netweaver XI/PI, EP, MDM, BI/BO, PCM etc. ï‚¤ Experienced SAP solution architects bringing in the knowledge and expertise ï‚¤ Investment in building proof of concepts, POCs and solution development ï‚¤ Access to SAP knowledge base and technology initiatives ï‚¤ Best synchronization between Time, Budget & Quality ï‚¤ Customized Ramp-Up / Ramp-Down Plan for cost effectiveness ï‚¤ Competitive & Flexible pricing model
